bike.description: A2-SL compact double-butted alloy w/ hydroformed top tube & down tube, integrated 1 1/2" lower head tube & PIIS BB86 shell, double water bottle mounts. Rear triangle: A2-SL alloy tapered seatstays/chainstays w/ rack mount, forged-road dropout w/ 1 eyelet and replaceable derailleur hanger

components.description: FC-770 Cross carbon blade, alloy crown w/ tapered alloy steerer & alloy dropout
Shimano Tiagra STI shifter/brake combo, Flight Deck-compatible, 20-speed
Vera Corsa double-wall aero alloy clincher, 28/32H alloy road rims, alloy disc hubs
Vera Helios, 30 tpi, 700c x 28mm, wire bead w/ flat barrier
ProMax Render-R mechanical disc for road, 160mm / 140mm rotors
FSA Orbit C-40, 1 1/8" upper - 1 1/2" lower, integrated
